method.name: save
onInit
showAllLinkedObjects

startProcessForBIVisible
closeDialog
isCloseDialogVisible
method.script: return (this.parent.metadataType == "tfs.dialogWithCloseControl");

method.name: startBIProcess
startBIProcessConfirmation
method.script: return "AW0016";

method.name: isProcessForBIMissing
method.script: var resList = workflow.findProcessesByType(this.model.cwOrderId, "workflow.blockingIssueProcess"); return (resList == null || resList.length == 0);

method.name: cancelBICreation
isCancelBICreationVisible
method.script: return (this.parent.metadataType == "tfs.dialogWithCloseControl");
